results.title: Major league (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: David S. Ward, Irby Smith, Chris Chesser and Morgan Creek
results.brief_description: The recently widowed, and new owner of the Cleveland Indians has a plan: field the worst team ever, watch the attendance fall, then move the franchise to glorious sun-drenched Miami. So she signs a punk-pitcher (Charlie Sheen), a gimpy-kneed womanising catcher (Tom Berenger), a third-rate third baseman (Corbin Bernsen), the outfielder Willie May Hates (Wesley Snipes) and a ‘wayout’ field of other crazy misfits. The perfect plan? maybe not, but it is the perfect ingredients for this riotous and inspiring comedy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David S. Ward, Irby Smith, Chris Chesser and Morgan Creek

results.title: City slickers (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Ron Underwood, Irby Smith, Face Production, Nelson Entertainment and Castle Rock
results.brief_description: Boss breathing down your neck? Bank manager screaming? Family driving you crazy? Then it’s about time you took a break on the the wild west side! Die hard city fellas Mitch, Phil and Ed are edging 40 and desperately searching for their lost youth. When they try to recapture it with a two week cattle-driving vacation in the midwest they discover that playing cowboy is more than just ridin’, ropin’, and sleepin’ out under the stars. These city slickers thought surviving mid-life crisis was tough. That’s nothing compared to the ride they’re about to take. Stars Billy Crystal and Jack Palance in an endearing and funny adventure that will have the whole family in stitches.

results.title: Basic instinct (Captioned) (E)
results.creator_credit: Paul Verhoeven, Alan Marshall, Studio Canal+ and Carolco Pictures
results.brief_description: Destined to be a modern classic, Paul Verhoeven’s effort has brought new definition and brilliance to the “femme fatale” of the film noir genre. It is all here, temptation, sex and murder, and all in the guise of a voluptuous beautiful woman. Michael Douglas plays an ex-undercover cop, burnt out and recovering from drug and alcohol addiction when he becomes involved with the investigation of a brutal murder. The prime suspect is a very rich, very beautiful young woman (Sharon Stone) who’s calm and collected exterior belies a predatory and hedonistic soul. Shocking, controversial and explicit, this film is not for the squeamish. Also stars George Dzundza. WARNING - SEXUALLY EXPLICIT.

results.title: Blinky Bill (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill the koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film which is based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.

results.title: Doctor Dolittle (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Richard Fleischer, Arthur P. Jacobs and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is a charming fantasy excursion which creates a wonderful world of endless imagination through music, dance and special effects. Rex Harrison stars in the madcap adventures of a 19th century English doctor who walks and talks and squarks with the animals. Based on the stories of Hugh Lofting, the good doctor gets himself into all sorts of funny predicaments in this fun film that earned an Academy Award nomination for Best Picture. With terrific music, fine acting, loveable creatures and a joyous fantasy tale, “Doctor Doolittle” is a classic for young and old alike.

results.title: Die hard (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: John McTiernan, Joel Silver, Lawrence Gordon, Silver Pictures, Gordon Co and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Bruce Willis stars as New York Detective, John McClane, newly arrived in Los Angeles to spend the Christmas holiday with his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia). But as McClane waits for his wife’s office party to break up, terrorists seize control of the building. While terrorists leader Hans Gruber and his savage henchmen round up hostages, McClane slips away unnoticed. Armed with only a service revolver and his own cunning, McClane launches his own one-man war. A crackling action thriller from beginning to end, “Die Hard” explodes with heart-stopping suspense. Also stars Alan Rickman, Alexander Godunov and Bonnie Bedelia. From the novel by Roderick Thorp.

results.title: Bright eyes
results.creator_credit: David Butler, Sol Wurtzel and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Shirley Temple collection”.
The first big film created especially for her, ‘Bright eyes’ helped make Shirley Temple a huge box-office star and features her most famous song, ‘On the good ship Lollipop’. The little darling of a group of aviators, Shirley splits her time between her pilot Godfather, Loop and her long-suffering mother who is a housemaid for a selfish, wealthy family. When a tragic accident suddenly leaves Shirley orphaned, Loop sets out to adopt Shirley - until he learns that he is not the only one determined to keep the adorable youngster. This is a colourized version of the original black and white film.

results.title: Hello Dolly (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Gene Kelly, Ernest Lehman, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Chenault
results.brief_description: Barbra Streisand is a knockout as Dolly Levi, the woman “who arranges things… like furniture and daffodils and lives”. The plot concerns Dolly, a young widow and professional matchmaker who sets her sights and whatever else she can muster, on conquering tight-fisted Yonkers merchant, Horace Vandergelder, beautifully played by Walter Matthau. How she does it has to be the grandest musical there ever was! So, spend a magical evening with the incomparable Barbra and enjoy a great musicals. Also stars Michael Crawford.

results.title: Dimples
results.creator_credit: William A. Seiter and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Shirley Temple collection”.
Shirley Temple stars in this delightful old-fashioned musical comedy. The cutest little girl with the biggest dimples, sings and dances her way from poverty to stardom. Ever cheerful, Little Dimples sings for money in the Bowery while her thieving Grandfather pickpockets the crowd she attracts. When a society lady adopts her, Dimples is discovered by the woman’s nephew who needs someone to play Little Eva in his upcoming production of ‘Uncle Tom’s cabin’. Charming and entertaining, this film is packed with laughs, tender moments and rousing musical numbers. This is a colourized version of the original black and white film.

results.title: Home alone (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Chris Columbus, John Hughes and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is one of the most successful comedies of the eighties and stars pint-sized hero Macaulay Culkin. In a chaotic frenzy to get to the airport on time, the McCallister family forget one thing - eight year old Kevin. When two bungling burglars attempt to break into the McCallister household, Kevin is left home alone to defend himself and his house. He outwits the burglars by waging war the only way he knows how. A John Hughes film co-starring Joe Pesci, “Home alone” is a modern-day classic.
